page.title: 20RECREATION:GAMES IN PLAYTIME
page.content: In the Corner Game,the boys chase the girls.When the girls are caught,they are put in the corner.When all are caught,the girls chase the boys etc.. In the T.V.Game,one person has to call out first letters of a programme and say the channel and time.The rest have to guess the programme.The person who guesses has to run up and down shouting the name.It is then his turn to choose the programme.In Stuck In The Mud,one person is it and they chase the rest.If caught you stand with legs astride and someone crawls through.If caught three times,you're "It".In Arky,someone counts to a number,the rest hide.If found they race to a post.If they reach it they say "Arky,Arky,1,2,3,in".If you're caught,the catcher says "Arky,Arky, 1,2,3,out",and you become the catcher, and the game starts again.
